mapper.select: SELECT pro_idx, id, post_idx, resume_idx, status, TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YY-MM-DD') created_at FROM PERSON_PROPOSAL_TB
SELECT ID, CNUMBER, CNAME, COM_LOGO, CREPRESENTIVE, ADDRESS, MANAGER_NAME, COMPANY_MANAGERPHONE, CSIZE, TO_CHAR( CYEAR, 'YY-MM-DD') CYEAR FROM COMPANY_INFO_TB WHERE ID = 'cp1'
